name: eomonth
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool date_calculator.
Tool description: This API helps to perform some computations on dates: accrual factors, maturity dates, contract dates,  and other due dates, datetime delta, time zones conversion, recurring dates, and much more. 
API description: Computes and returns a date on the last day of the month in the future or past. This resource behave exactly as Excel EOMONTH function.

months.description: The number of months before or after the start date. A positive value results in a future date, while a negative value results in a past date.

start_date.description: The start date w/ or w/o the time part in  [ISO 8601 format](https://www.w3.org/TR/NOTE-datetime)
